75 void showUsage()
76 {
77  printf("\n");
78  printf("Usage :\n");
79  printf(" ./example object.png scene.png\n");
80  exit(1);
81 }

83 // gets called whenever a new message is availible in the input puffer
84 void imageCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg, int argc, char * argv[], std::string objectsPath)
85 {
86  static int imagecounter = 0;
87  imagecounter++;
88  cv::Mat image = cv_bridge::toCvShare(msg, "bgr8")->image;
89  cv::Mat imageGrey;
90  cv::cvtColor(image, imageGrey, CV_BGR2GRAY);
91 
92  if(imagecounter == 1)
93  {
94  cv::imshow("view", imageGrey);
95  imagecounter = 0;
96  }
97 
98  ROS_INFO("image callback");
99  cv::waitKey(1);
100 
101 
102  QTime time;
103 
104  time.start();
105 
106  //cv::Mat objectImg = cv::imread(argv[1], cv::IMREAD_GRAYSCALE);
107 // cv::Mat sceneImg = cv::imread(argv[2], cv::IMREAD_GRAYSCALE);
108  //Load as grayscale
109  cv::Mat objectImg = cv::imread(objectsPath, cv::IMREAD_GRAYSCALE);
110  cv::Mat sceneImg = imageGrey;
111  cv::imshow("view2", objectImg);
112 
113  if(!objectImg.empty() && !sceneImg.empty())
114  {
115  printf("Let's start");
116  printf("Loading images: %d ms\n", time.restart());
117  std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> objectKeypoints;
118  std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> sceneKeypoints;
119  cv::Mat objectDescriptors;
120  cv::Mat sceneDescriptors;
121 
123  // EXTRACT KEYPOINTS
125  cv::Ptr<cv::FeatureDetector> detector;
126  // The detector can be any of (see OpenCV features2d.hpp):
127  #if CV_MAJOR_VERSION == 2
128  // detector = cv::Ptr(new cv::DenseFeatureDetector());
129  // detector = cv::Ptr(new cv::FastFeatureDetector());
130  // detector = cv::Ptr(new cv::GFTTDetector());
131  // detector = cv::Ptr(new cv::MSER());
132  // detector = cv::Ptr(new cv::ORB());
133  detector = cv::Ptr<cv::FeatureDetector>(new cv::SIFT());
134  // detector = cv::Ptr(new cv::StarFeatureDetector());
135  // detector = cv::Ptr(new cv::SURF(600.0));
136  // detector = cv::Ptr(new cv::BRISK());
137  #else
138  detector = cv::xfeatures2d::SIFT::create();
139  #endif
140  detector->detect(objectImg, objectKeypoints);
141  printf("Object: %d keypoints detected in %d ms\n", (int)objectKeypoints.size(), time.restart());
142  detector->detect(sceneImg, sceneKeypoints);
143  printf("Scene: %d keypoints detected in %d ms\n", (int)sceneKeypoints.size(), time.restart());
144 
146  // EXTRACT DESCRIPTORS
148  cv::Ptr<cv::DescriptorExtractor> extractor;
149  #if CV_MAJOR_VERSION == 2
150  // The extractor can be any of (see OpenCV features2d.hpp):
151  // extractor = cv::Ptr(new cv::BriefDescriptorExtractor());
152  // extractor = cv::Ptr(new cv::ORB());
153  extractor = cv::Ptr<cv::DescriptorExtractor>(new cv::SIFT());
154  // extractor = cv::Ptr(new cv::SURF(600.0));
155  // extractor = cv::Ptr(new cv::BRISK());
156  // extractor = cv::Ptr(new cv::FREAK());
157  #else
158  extractor = cv::xfeatures2d::SIFT::create();
159  #endif
160  extractor->compute(objectImg, objectKeypoints, objectDescriptors);
161  printf("Object: %d descriptors extracted in %d ms\n", objectDescriptors.rows, time.restart());
162  extractor->compute(sceneImg, sceneKeypoints, sceneDescriptors);
163  printf("Scene: %d descriptors extracted in %d ms\n", sceneDescriptors.rows, time.restart());
164 
166  // NEAREST NEIGHBOR MATCHING USING FLANN LIBRARY (included in OpenCV)
168  cv::Mat results;
169  cv::Mat dists;
170  std::vector<std::vector<cv::DMatch> > matches;
171  int k=2; // find the 2 nearest neighbors
172  bool useBFMatcher = false; // SET TO TRUE TO USE BRUTE FORCE MATCHER
173  if(objectDescriptors.type()==CV_8U)
174  {
175  // Binary descriptors detected (from ORB, Brief, BRISK, FREAK)
176  printf("Binary descriptors detected...\n");
177  if(useBFMatcher)
178  {
179  cv::BFMatcher matcher(cv::NORM_HAMMING); // use cv::NORM_HAMMING2 for ORB descriptor with WTA_K == 3 or 4 (see ORB constructor)
180  matcher.knnMatch(objectDescriptors, sceneDescriptors, matches, k);
181  }
182  else
183  {
184  // Create Flann LSH index
185  cv::flann::Index flannIndex(sceneDescriptors, cv::flann::LshIndexParams(12, 20, 2), cvflann::FLANN_DIST_HAMMING);
186  printf("Time creating FLANN LSH index = %d ms\n", time.restart());
187 
188  // search (nearest neighbor)
189  flannIndex.knnSearch(objectDescriptors, results, dists, k, cv::flann::SearchParams() );
190  }
191  }
192  else
193  {
194  // assume it is CV_32F
195  printf("Float descriptors detected...\n");
196  if(useBFMatcher)
197  {
198  cv::BFMatcher matcher(cv::NORM_L2);
199  matcher.knnMatch(objectDescriptors, sceneDescriptors, matches, k);
200  }
201  else
202  {
203  // Create Flann KDTree index
204  cv::flann::Index flannIndex(sceneDescriptors, cv::flann::KDTreeIndexParams(), cvflann::FLANN_DIST_EUCLIDEAN);
205  printf("Time creating FLANN KDTree index = %d ms\n", time.restart());
206 
207  // search (nearest neighbor)
208  flannIndex.knnSearch(objectDescriptors, results, dists, k, cv::flann::SearchParams() );
209  }
210  }
211  printf("Time nearest neighbor search = %d ms\n", time.restart());
212 
213  // Conversion to CV_32F if needed
214  if(dists.type() == CV_32S)
215  {
216  cv::Mat temp;
217  dists.convertTo(temp, CV_32F);
218  dists = temp;
219  }
220 
221  cv::imshow("view3", results);
222 
223 
225  // PROCESS NEAREST NEIGHBOR RESULTS
227  // Set gui data
228  // ObjWidget objWidget(0, objectKeypoints, QMultiMap<int,int>(), cvtCvMat2QImage(objectImg));
229  // ObjWidget sceneWidget(0, sceneKeypoints, QMultiMap<int,int>(), cvtCvMat2QImage(sceneImg));
230 
231  // Find correspondences by NNDR (Nearest Neighbor Distance Ratio)
232  float nndrRatio = 0.8f;
233  std::vector<cv::Point2f> mpts_1, mpts_2; // Used for homography
234  std::vector<int> indexes_1, indexes_2; // Used for homography
235  std::vector<uchar> outlier_mask; // Used for homography
236  // Check if this descriptor matches with those of the objects
237  if(!useBFMatcher)
238  {
239  for(int i=0; i<objectDescriptors.rows; ++i)
240  {
241  // Apply NNDR
242  //printf("q=%d dist1=%f dist2=%f\n", i, dists.at<float>(i,0), dists.at<float>(i,1));
243  if(results.at<int>(i,0) >= 0 && results.at<int>(i,1) >= 0 &&
244  dists.at<float>(i,0) <= nndrRatio * dists.at<float>(i,1))
245  {
246  mpts_1.push_back(objectKeypoints.at(i).pt);
247  indexes_1.push_back(i);
248 
249  mpts_2.push_back(sceneKeypoints.at(results.at<int>(i,0)).pt);
250  indexes_2.push_back(results.at<int>(i,0));
251  }
252  }
253  }
254  else
255  {
256  for(unsigned int i=0; i<matches.size(); ++i)
257  {
258  // Apply NNDR
259  //printf("q=%d dist1=%f dist2=%f\n", matches.at(i).at(0).queryIdx, matches.at(i).at(0).distance, matches.at(i).at(1).distance);
260  if(matches.at(i).size() == 2 &&
261  matches.at(i).at(0).distance <= nndrRatio * matches.at(i).at(1).distance)
262  {
263  mpts_1.push_back(objectKeypoints.at(matches.at(i).at(0).queryIdx).pt);
264  indexes_1.push_back(matches.at(i).at(0).queryIdx);
265 
266  mpts_2.push_back(sceneKeypoints.at(matches.at(i).at(0).trainIdx).pt);
267  indexes_2.push_back(matches.at(i).at(0).trainIdx);
268  }
269  }
270  }
271 
272  // FIND HOMOGRAPHY
273  unsigned int minInliers = 8;
274  if(mpts_1.size() >= minInliers)
275  {
276  time.start();
277  cv::Mat H = findHomography(mpts_1,
278  mpts_2,
279  cv::RANSAC,
280  1.0,
281  outlier_mask);
282  printf("Time finding homography = %d ms\n", time.restart());
283  int inliers=0, outliers=0;
284  for(unsigned int k=0; k<mpts_1.size();++k)
285  {
286  if(outlier_mask.at(k))
287  {
288  ++inliers;
289  }
290  else
291  {
292  ++outliers;
293  }
294  }
295  QTransform hTransform(
296  H.at<double>(0,0), H.at<double>(1,0), H.at<double>(2,0),
297  H.at<double>(0,1), H.at<double>(1,1), H.at<double>(2,1),
298  H.at<double>(0,2), H.at<double>(1,2), H.at<double>(2,2));
299 
300  // GUI : Change color and add homography rectangle
301  QColor color(Qt::green);
302  int alpha = 130;
303  color.setAlpha(alpha);
304  for(unsigned int k=0; k<mpts_1.size();++k)
305  {
306  if(outlier_mask.at(k))
307  {
308  // objWidget.setKptColor(indexes_1.at(k), color);
309  // sceneWidget.setKptColor(indexes_2.at(k), color);
310  }
311  else
312  {
313  // objWidget.setKptColor(indexes_1.at(k), QColor(255,0,0,alpha));
314  // sceneWidget.setKptColor(indexes_2.at(k), QColor(255,0,0,alpha));
315  }
316  }
317  QPen rectPen(color);
318  rectPen.setWidth(4);
319  // QGraphicsRectItem * rectItem = new QGraphicsRectItem(objWidget.pixmap().rect());
320  // rectItem->setPen(rectPen);
321  // rectItem->setTransform(hTransform);
322  // sceneWidget.addRect(rectItem);
323  printf("Inliers=%d Outliers=%d\n", inliers, outliers);
324  }
325  else
326  {
327  printf("Not enough matches (%d) for homography...\n", (int)mpts_1.size());
328  }
329 
330  // Wait for gui
331  // objWidget.setGraphicsViewMode(false);
332  // objWidget.setWindowTitle("Object");
333  // if(objWidget.pixmap().width() <= 800)
334  // {
335  // objWidget.setMinimumSize(objWidget.pixmap().width(), objWidget.pixmap().height());
336  // }
337  // else
338  // {
339  // objWidget.setMinimumSize(800, 600);
340  // objWidget.setAutoScale(false);
341  // }
342 
343  // sceneWidget.setGraphicsViewMode(false);
344  // sceneWidget.setWindowTitle("Scene");
345  // if(sceneWidget.pixmap().width() <= 800)
346  // {
347  // sceneWidget.setMinimumSize(sceneWidget.pixmap().width(), sceneWidget.pixmap().height());
348  // }
349  // else
350  // {
351  // sceneWidget.setMinimumSize(800, 600);
352  // sceneWidget.setAutoScale(false);
353  // }
354 
355  // sceneWidget.show();
356  // objWidget.show();
357 
358  // int r = app.exec();
359  printf("Closing...\n");
360 
361  //return r;
362 
363 
364  }
365  else
366  {
367  printf("Images are not valid!\n");
368  showUsage();
369  }
370 
371 
372 
373 }
374 
375 int main(int argc, char * argv[])
376 {
377  // init this node
378  ros::init(argc, argv, "sign_recognition_node");
379 
380  bool gui = true;
381  std::string objectsPath;
382  std::string sessionPath;
383 
384  // get ros node handle
385  ros::NodeHandle nh;
386  if(nh.hasParam("objectsPath")){
387  ROS_INFO("Object=true");
388  }
389  else ROS_INFO("Object=false");
390 
391  if(nh.hasParam("gui")){
392  ROS_INFO("gui parameter found");
393  }
394  else ROS_INFO("gui parameter not found");
395 
396 
397 
398  nh.param("gui", gui, gui);
399  nh.getParam("sign_recognition_node/objects_path", objectsPath);
400  nh.param("session_path", sessionPath, sessionPath);
401 
402  ROS_INFO("gui=%d", (int)gui);
403  ROS_INFO("objects_path=%s", objectsPath.c_str());
404  ROS_INFO("session_path=%s", sessionPath.c_str());
405 
406 
407 
408  ROS_INFO("Hello world!");
409 
410 // // Loop starts here:
411 // // loop rate value is set in Hz
412 // ros::Rate loop_rate(1);
413 // while (ros::ok())
414 // {
415 // // clear input/output buffers
416 // ros::spinOnce();
417 // // this is needed to ensure a const. loop rate
418 // loop_rate.sleep();
419 // }
420 if(argc<3)
421  {
422  objectsPath = "/home/pses/catkin_ws/src/pses_sign_recognition/data/objs/6.png";
423 
424  }
425 
426 
427  // GUI stuff
428  QApplication app(argc, argv);
429 
430  ros::Subscriber imageSub = nh.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Image>(
431  "kinect2/qhd/image_color", 1, boost::bind(imageCallback, _1, argc, argv, objectsPath));
432 
433 
434  cv::namedWindow("view");
435  cv::namedWindow("view2");
436  cv::namedWindow("view3");
437  cv::startWindowThread();
438 
439  //change the exposure
440  cv::VideoCapture cap;
441  cap.set(cv::CAP_PROP_EXPOSURE,10);
442 
443 
444 
445  ros::Rate loop_rate(25);
446 
447  while (ros::ok())
448  {
449 
450  // clear input/output buffers
451  ros::spinOnce();
452  // this is needed to ensure a const. loop rate
453  loop_rate.sleep();
454  }
455 
456  return 1;
457 
458  ros::spin();
459 }
